summary.overview: This JCL creates an alternate index on the Transaction Master file to enable secondary key access to transaction records. It establishes an alternate access path using a 26-byte key starting at position 304, allowing applications to retrieve transaction data through this secondary key structure.
business_functions: Define alternate index structure on Transaction Master VSAM file with 26-byte key starting at position 304
Create path entry to enable application access through alternate index key
Build and populate alternate index with existing transaction data for fast secondary key retrieval

TRANIDX.jcl.program_overview: IBM Access Method Services utility for VSAM file operations and alternate index management

datasource_summary.name: Transaction Master File (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.TRANSACT.VSAM.KSDS)
datasource_summary.function: Primary transaction master file containing transaction records with 350-byte fixed length records that serves as the base dataset for creating alternate index access paths

datasource_summary.name: Transaction Alternate Index (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.TRANSACT.VSAM.AIX)
datasource_summary.function: Alternate index that provides an alternative access path to the transaction master file, allowing records to be accessed using a different key sequence than the primary key

datasource_summary.name: Transaction Alternate Index Data Component (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.TRANSACT.VSAM.AIX.DATA)
datasource_summary.function: Data component of the alternate index that stores the actual alternate index data records with non-unique keys starting at position 304 with length 26

datasource_summary.name: Transaction Alternate Index Structure Component (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.TRANSACT.VSAM.AIX.INDEX)
datasource_summary.function: Index component of the alternate index that contains the index structure for fast access to the alternate index data component

datasource_summary.name: Transaction Alternate Index Path Definition (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.TRANSACT.VSAM.AIX.PATH)
datasource_summary.function: Path definition that provides a logical connection between applications and the alternate index, enabling programs to access the base file through the alternate key sequence

flow_diagram_code:
flowchart TD
    IDCAMS["IBM Access Method Services utility for VSAM file operations and alternate index management (IDCAMS) "]
